snippet: The Day: Joseph J. Lhota, eyeing a run for mayor, is getting enthusiastic support from former Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani. Though when it comes to choosing sides in major elections, Mr. Giuliani has the Midas touch in reverse.
abstract: The Day: Joseph J. Lhota, eyeing a run for mayor, is getting enthusiastic support from former Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani. Though when it comes to choosing sides in major elections, Mr. Giuliani has the Midas touch in reverse.

headline.main: A Note for the Transit Chief: Beware the Endorsement From Giuliani
